# Load Libraries
```{r message=FALSE}
library(glue)
library(here)
library(readr)
library(rsample)
```

# Setup
```{r}
params <- config::get(file = here("params.yaml"))
data_name <- "<data-name>"
```

# Read Data
```{r}
wrangle_data <- read_rds(here(glue("data/wrangle/{data_name}.rds")))
```

# Split Data
```{r}
set.seed(params$seed)
split <- initial_split(wrangle_data, prop = params$split$train)
train_data <- training(split)
test_data <- testing(split)
```
